適應症: 火傷、失血、腎病質及手術後所引起之蛋白質不足之營養補給
主成分略述: POTASSIUM CHLORIDE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, L-ALANINE, L-ARGININE, L-HISTIDINE, L-ISOLEUCINE, L-LEUCINE, LYSINE L-, L-METHIONINE, ORNITHINE L- ASPARTATE L-, L-PHENYLALANINE, L-PROLINE, L-THREONINE, L-TRYPTOPHAN, L-VALINE, GLYCINE (EQ TO AMINOACETIC ACID)(EQ TO GLYCOCOLL), PANTHENOL, NIACINAMIDE (NICOTINAMIDE), RIBOFLAVIN PHOSPHATE SODIUM, PYRIDOXINE HCL, MORPHOLINE ETHYL RUTIN, MALIC ACID L-, SORBITOL
